title: Live test Intent pipeline end-to-end
close_reason: Live pipeline run successful: 25 intent → 8 scored → 3 exported (batch HADES-20260217-001). managementLevel list bug found and fixed.

title: Fix: XSS — API data interpolated into raw HTML without html.escape()
description: ui_components.py:1993, pages/2_Geography_Workflow.py:1086 — company_name, best_contact_name, and error msg strings from ZoomInfo API inserted into st.markdown(..., unsafe_allow_html=True) without escaping. Fix: html.escape() all API-sourced values before HTML interpolation.

title: Story 2.6 gap: add rapidfuzz fuzzy matching to cross-workflow dedup
description: dedup.py uses exact normalized string matching on get_dedup_key(). Story 2.6 AC requires rapidfuzz fuzzy matching with configurable threshold. 'Acme' vs 'Acmee' won't match currently. Add rapidfuzz dependency, implement fuzzy company name matching in find_duplicates().

title: Harden API clients: edge case tests for messy data
close_reason: 4 bugs fixed + 28 edge case tests: distance strings, accuracy strings, ZIP+4 variants, mixed int/string IDs

title: Fix: thread-safety on shared ZoomInfoClient
description: pages/2_Geography_Workflow.py:980 — Background geo search thread and main Streamlit thread mutate last_exchange, access_token, _last_request_time on same @st.cache_resource instance with no locking. Fix: add threading.Lock to ZoomInfoClient.__init__, acquire in _get_token() and last_exchange writes.

title: Live test Contact Enrich with real data
close_reason: Contact Enrich confirmed working in live pipeline run. 3-level nested response parsing works. Enrich returned 3 contacts from 3 requested.

title: Story 2.3 gap: build expansion_timeline component
description: Story 2.3 AC requires expansion_timeline component showing per-step detail: parameter changed, old value -> new value, contacts found. Currently only aggregate summary shown. Build in ui_components.py, integrate into Geography Workflow.

title: Fix: geography score unclamped — can exceed 100
description: scoring.py:196 — calculate_geography_score returns round(composite) without min(100,...) clamp. Intent scorer has it. One-line fix: min(100, round(composite)).

title: Production test UX (shadcn, action bar, export validation)
close_reason: All 10 UX audit issues completed and visually verified

title: Add Zoho CRM dedup check at export time
description: VSDP cross-references every lead against Zoho CRM Deals before export — marks leads already in CRM and adds the Zoho record URL to Import Notes. HADES has export_dedup.py for cross-session dedup but no CRM check. Add Zoho matching at export time to prevent pushing duplicates already being worked in CRM. Reference: VSDP/vanillasoft_automation.py lines 762-874.

title: Live test all 4 pipelines with Streamlit running
Fix: expired token skips persisted-token check
description: zoominfo_client.py:221-234 — When in-memory token expires, 'not self.access_token' is False so persisted DB token is never checked. Forces unnecessary re-auth. Fix: restructure _get_token() to check DB when current token is expired, not just when it's unset.

title: Plan compliance: missing CTA, error log, PII enforcement, doc updates
description:
Grouped low-priority plan compliance gaps from code review:
- Story 4.2: Missing 'Request Territory Query' CTA on Executive Summary
- Story 4.3: No persistent error log (only pipeline runs, not interactive errors)
- Story 1.1: No PII sanitization enforcement on PipelineError messages
- Story 2.4: Geography scoring weights deviate from plan (intentional — update plan docs)
- Convention: pages/7_Score_Calibration.py:61 uses raw SQL instead of turso_db method
- CLAUDE.md stale: documents 5 tables when 10 exist
- No keyboard shortcuts (0 of 4 implemented)
- No template rename (Story 2.5)
- No SVG sparklines or WoW deltas (Story 4.2)
